name: aws-cdk-wrapper-for-amazon-neptune-export-for-fake-news-detection
description: This CDK stack deploys the CFN template for the neptune ML and export functionality. Specifically, it deploys the following CloudFormation template from the AWS samples: https://aws-neptune-customer-samples.s3.amazonaws.com/v2/cloudformation-templates/neptune-ml-nested-stack.json
